--- title: Plot module keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This module allow to plot things easily using matplotlib and seaborn" description: "This module allow to plot things easily using matplotlib and seaborn" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

plot1[source]

plot1(x, y, figsize=(15, 10), style='ggplot', title=None, label=None, xlabel=None, ylabel=None)

allow you to plot one curve. It uses matplotlib plot function. x and y are both 1D list

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

plotN[source]

plotN(xs, ys, figsize=(15, 10), style='ggplot', title=None, labels=None, xlabel=None, ylabel=None)

allow you to plot n curves on the same graph. It uses matplotlib plot function. xs and ys are both ND lists

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

distplot[source]

distplot(x, figsize=(15, 10), style='ggplot', title=None)

allow you to plot the distribution of a random variable x

{% endraw %}
